segments.text: Hi , Bob . I heard that you had passed your driving test . Is it true ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . A few days ago I have no right to get a driving licence . But now I get it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it can be quite tough . Many people fail to pass the test at the first time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What does the driving test require ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should enroll in driving school and then take a road test and a written test . After you pass both tests , you'll get your licence .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I see . I need more practice before I take the driving test .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry about your driving test . I think you will pass the test and get the driver's licence very soon .
segments.speaker: S2
